content.detailedDescription:
I was standing in my drive way with a friend of mine smoking a ciggerett and we both noticed and yellow amber light up in the sky moving in a side stepping motion and crossing the horizon very very quickly.

later that night i was making my self a late night, you can see on to the back deck from the table. 

it was dark out side but i saw something move in the darkness, i went to investigate it thought it may have been the deer that come to the yard a lot 


so i ran to my room downstairs where my windows are ground level. i went over to the window and whipped the curtain and window open and saw a out line of something but nothing really, i snapped a picture and locked everything up. 

i took a quick look at the pictures but was more focused on the outside. 

i bounced around window to window and saw nothing. 

after staying up all night i feel asleep at sun up. 

the next day i was looking at the pics again and saw this and to be honest i’m bugging out a little because everyone i show it to says the same thing, it’s a demon or a alien. 

both very scary conclusions. i was showing my mom the pictures last night and they started fuzzing out and slowly going out of focus and they are now no where on the desk top. 

thankfully it was in my back up google drive account.
content.summary: High flying zig zagging yellow light that was very fast

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i are where avid campers and have spent many weekends and vacations camping in primitive state campgrounds. i am retired military having served with naval air, army artillery and air force.

we have never reported this event and i will relate it to you in as much detail as i can recall as it occurred some years ago.. we where camping and north/south lake in the catskill mountains in new york. the year was late 70s or early 80s. our campsite was adjacent to the recreation field and offered a clear un-obstructed view of the night sky. at approximately  2800 feet above sea level, this remote primitive mountain top campground had not electric hookups (no lights) and offered spectacular clear views of the night sky and stars against a velvet backdrop.

it was late and all was quiet in the campground. we had a small fire going and my wife and i where cuddling close to the fire to keep warm. i had one of the short chairs you use on the beach with my knees up and my wife was leaning back against my knees as we both gazed at the sky above.

it was not unusual to see satellites passing thru the sky on these nights. they could be seen like  bright stars which moves slow and steady across the night sky and we had seen many in the past. we were both silent taking in the night sounds when they moved into view.

from behind us i saw what looked like two satellites moving in perfect unison across the sky at the exact same pace, side by side, and about 1 inch apart. i thought to myself this was unusual as i had never seen two satellites moving this close and in unison. i thought that perhaps this was some type of stereoscopic mapping of the terrain, either optically or perhaps radar 3 dimensional imaging to provide elevation information.

when the objects where directly over head they came to a crisp stop and paused for about 10 seconds at which time the moved at a hight rate of speed, left and right, away from each other. their speed was such that they crossed the entire sky and disappeared over the horizon and from my view in a second or two.

my wife then asked me “ did you just see those two satellites take off in different directions?”. i jokingly answered, “i didn’t see a thing”. as we talked about it she asked what i  thought it was and i told her i had no idea and knew of nothing that could accelerate to the great speed instantly and traverse the entire sky in seconds.
content.summary: Two satellite type objects moved in unison. then stopped briefly and shot of in opposite directions at extremely high rate of speed.

content.detailedDescription:
Estaba checando una cama nikon y fotografia 6 vez un objeto muy luminoso del que irradiaba luz verde claro como se aprecia en las fotografías y en el video que dura 4.00 minutos se aprecia como cambia de forma circular a una parte del circulo con lado plano y posteriormente se desprende un parte del objeto y forma otro mas pequeño luego se comunican los 2 objetos y se tranfieren la masa de energía del mas grande al mas chico hasta que tiene el tamaño del primero.

solamente viendo el video se puede creer.
content.summary: Se ve como una estrella

content.detailedDescription:
Left a trail and then changed direction very fast and disappeared in a no flight area.

never seen an airplane, helicopter or other known flying object there.
content.summary: Appeared quick hover then shift direction very fast

content.detailedDescription: I am on my farm and go out to smoke in the evenings and if have difficulty sleeping sit outside and see flashing lights/orbs. i have pictures. my mom and husband have witnessed this and yet they say it is nothing. i have more pictures to add so will do another post to you and this has been going on for months now and for some reason. my pears were taken off of my tree in september and no sign of breakage or disturbance to the ground. wnich i thought was very weird. the occurences happen from 9 pm to 6 am or just before daylight. they move around to different areas
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: I see lots of orbs and fireballs and then when i take pictures and increase size they look like spaceship.

content.detailedDescription: Would like to go back to case number 69231 and 70631.  we were on vacation in branson mo last week and we went in a craft store and the implant in my arm set off a security allert arm.   we did talk to a person that does hipnosis and she said she was sceptic about putting me under because it could affect my life to much so didn't want to do it.  i would like it tested for microwave and tv frequencys.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were pulling an all nighter in order to study for our college calculus exams when i decided that my friend and i should run to the gas station for energy drinks to keep us up. it had snowed all week so got dressed and ready for the snow outside. we went out to my car and started driving down to the end of our street. i took a left onto the next street and drove for three blocks. as i was looking at the road and noticed a bright red flaming ball just above the houses in front of us. i turned to my friend and told him to look. we stared at it for a few seconds before i pulled the car over to the side of the road. we both hopped out of the car and got our phones and started taking videos. the flaming ball slowly hovered above the houses across the street from where we parked about 500 feet above the ground. there was no noise to be heard coming the sky and upon examination the lights that it was omitting were not like that of any airplane or helicopter i had ever seen. the object seemed to spin and hover across the sky and as it spun it blinked a yellowish white light. the light would blink about twice every second. after a few seconds i realized that the flaming ball was actually a spherical orb in shape but with a silver or blackish center. it hovered above parallel to us across the street heading in towards the east when suddenly it started to freak out. the orb started making circles and then darting off into different directions as it ascended higher into the sky. after about five seconds it stopped and then shot off like a bullet up into a hole in the cloud cover where we watched it go farther into space until it got so small it vanished into the darkness of space. my friend and i looked at each other phones to see who got the best video but we both had only recorded it for a few seconds before stopping the videos just to watch the orb but my friend had gotten a great video of the orb as it hovered across the sky. we watched the video he had recorded and zoomed in as far as we could to the object. as i watched my friends video i noticed a strange pattern with the movement of the lights on the orb. i put the video into slow motion and played it through. a darkness fell over me as i gathered together what i just saw. as i moved frame by frame through each part of the video i saw that object was spinning in a cirlce. i was able to determine this by the light that was attached to the orb. it turned with the spinning from one position to the next in each frame in a clockwise motion. i was looking at the bottom of some type of u.F.O. i'm still not sure what i saw but when i got back to my house i started to research what i saw. i found multiple videos online with the same flashing orbs as the one i had seen that day.
content.summary: Flaming ball of light

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from work at about 7:50 pm i noticed a triangular shaped vehicle flying a couple of hundred feet above the tree tops i just noticed it and it was by me, not flying at a terrible rate of speed but going in the opposite direction that i was. it appeared two low in altitude to be a regular aircraft. it had two red lights that i saw one on the front tip of the triangle and one on its edge.  i was shocked it look like nothing that i have seen before in the sky.  i am unsure if anyone reported seeing this vehicle but i would like to know if anyone else reported it.  when i saw the vehicle i was on i-90 east bound near the vrooman rd exit  it was flying at a low altitude along side the freeway heading west
content.summary: I saw a triangular shaped vehicle flying along i-90 near the vrooman rd exit in lake county ohio it was flying staight alongside the highway just a couple of hunndred feet above the tree line

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were sitting in our backyard watching the moon during the blue moon weekend while the sky was clear.At 4:52,i saw a very long meteor and right above it was the ufo. at first ,i asked my husband "what is that?". it was huge and it was silent and there 3 really big white lights straight across in the back.The object was very black ..I was very confused and i was scared when i saw it.The lights merged together and it looked like the object went into a piece of the sky and disappeared.
content.summary: We saw the ufo during the blue moon weekend.It was a black triangle with 3 huge white lights in a row across the back.It glided across the sky silently and the lights merged together and the object looked as if it went into a piece of the sky and disappea

content.detailedDescription:
this morning at around 5:25 a.M., i went outside to my front yard to walk my little dog. as i walked out from my porch, i looked up at the sky as there was a clear spot with huge stars. i looked over to the east to look at the moon, when one of the stars in that cluster caught my eye, it started moving. i quickly looked back and was astounded to see that one of the huge stars on the perimeter of the little formation started moving north slowly, and deliberately,  across the sky. it was not twinkling or changing colors, just a huge ball of light that looked exactly like a star. 

i stood there in wonder and continued to watch it. after a few minutes it got closer to what looked like a tiny star and they twinkled at each other as the big one passed the little one. this was just astounding! i continued to watch the big star travel across the sky until it disappeared behind a large, fluffy cloud. 

i wanted to go inside and get my husband, but i knew if i turned away it would be gone. 

i have seen ufo's before, and one time in 2009 we had a shared family sighting of a large triangle craft in fort lauderdale, but i have never reported anything before. i also had a strange experience about a month ago while working in texas, i woke up with a strange triangle mark made of lines on my hand. i do have a very clear picture of this mark. i would love to talk to an investigator, as i have a lot of contact with ufo's and other paranormal experiences. 

thank you very much for your time.
content.summary: Star was stationary then began moving

content.detailedDescription: Standing in driveway. in the eastern horizon two large light orbs took turns expanding and contracting about 2-3 times each before disappearing. just large light orbs. looked like two suns in the horizon swelling up and down. no mechanical crafts observed. was abducted at some point as a child, left metal shard in my foot caused me problems at the airport since i can remember the first time at 13. just found out this past summer. saw x-rays. no scar on foot. no memory of abduction throughout my life. been in contact telepathically with the aliens since 2009. have a lot of supernatural knowledge relating to astrology i'm willing to share with you. no reports missing during abduction leaves me thinking that the aliens stopped time or can time travel me back to time of abduction. leaving no evidence except shard in foot. have been remembering some of abduction details lately. i think the aliens are unblocking my memory. a lot of other information i can share if you'd like
content.summary: In 2009 aliens contacted me started me on a journey of knowledge collection

content.detailedDescription: It scared deer as it flew by
content.summary: Cauaght on field cam

content.detailedDescription: El objeto subia y bajaba se quedaba estatico, luego flasheaba muchas luces, luego se movia de izquierda a derecha, luego flasheaba hasta que termino decendiendo a una montana osea el avila.(waraira repano) y yo normalmente veo ese tipo de objetos. y siempre aviso a las personas que tengo cerca, ya que no quiero persanr que soy el unico que los ve.
content.summary: Estubo estatico durante unos minutos y luego se movia de arriba a bajo

content.detailedDescription: The time was 8:25pm central time. i was just getting home so i stayed outside on the phone talking to my cousin telling him that me and my two daughters one 7 years old & the other 14 years old had just witnessed a triangle shaped ufo on winchester and hacks cross rd hovering over the fed ex building like about 500 or less feet in the sky low enough to see the shape & the odd light on the craft. i had dropped my 14 year old daughter off after the first sighting and once me and my 7 year old daughter got home as i said i was on the phone, then my daughter said "look dad there goes another one" i looked and told my cousin i would call him back. this craft was flying from the southwest of my house towards my house, once it got closer towards my house that's when i noticed that it was triangle shaped with lights at the points. i then took 3 pictures 1 of the pictures showed real good what we both witnessed. we both observed the craft for 3-5mins before we couldn't see it anymore passing our house headed northeast. the feeling i had was of amazement but yet a good feeling. my daughter was in amazement but yet scared because she had never saw anything like this in her life. it moved slowly in the sky as if it wanted us to get a full description which we got with pictures. when we first noticed the craft i thought it could have been a airplane until it got closer to my house that's when i noticed the triangle shape and lights.
content.summary: Me and my daughter 7 year old daughter was standing in the drive way i was on the phone telling my cousin i had just saw a triangle shaped ufo on winchester & hacks cross .. then my daughter got my attention i said dad there goes another one

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my car when i looked up to see a triangular shaped ufo (similar to stealth aircraft but smaller in size) but the perimeter of this craft was glowing neon green and you could barely see the black surface. what scared me during this experience is the fact it's by lax and it flew in front of a passenger plane ascending at such fast speeds on a path and then completely disappeared into the sky where there were no buildings, objects, power lines. there were 2 more passenger planes right after it disappeared as well as a search helicopter and what looked like another helicopter. it was a fast experience but it shot through the sky like a fireball but the shape was so distinctive and it had flown right in front of a passenger plane and then completely vanished in plain view. i know what stealth aircrafts look like and this was simply not that.
content.summary: Triangular craft glowing green ascended at fast speeds then disappeared in open sky

content.detailedDescription:
I would not have seen this if not already looking up at stars. said to my wife "that's crazy... what is that?", by the time she moved to my side of the hot tub it was moving past a tree. i pointed but like i said, you almost had to be looking directly at the sky where it passed to notice it, so she didn't catch it. 
at first it reminded me of a glowing string, but very uniformed, and in hind sight i'd say it was about like the leading edge of a boomerang. maybe like something (shooting star?) had shot through the sky and left a trail, curved, somewhat dimmer than the light of the stars next to it. easy to miss if you weren't looking.
then, i realized it was moving, and fast. and totally quiet. and it wasn't moving the direction i'd have guessed, because my initial take of "shooting star leaving a trail" wasn't right. it was moving as if flying, all the sudden it reminded me of the leading edge of a b2 bomber, but smoother curve. there was trajectory and symmetry. it was headed the direction the nose was facing. there was a sense of mass or something behind the illuminated edge.
i wish i had the sense to track stars it was passing before they passed to see if it was blocking them, and for how long, i felt it had some mass behind the leading edge glow, but i didn't prove it to myself as i watched it by checking for stars it was about to pass. wish i'd thought of that.
in the 40 seconds i watched (maybe 20 seconds, no clue on time), it seemed boomerang shaped but other than my impression, i only know for sure the front edge was. the rest was dark/transparent. no lights other than the leading edge glow.
and it moved in a direction, pretty fast (i live and work next to an airport (okc)), i know how fast airplanes cover the skyline, this was faster, high, and biger. and quiet. but not knowing what i was looking at, hard to put in perspective.
it went over the tree, past the next house, and i saw nothing else. never seen anything like it before. totally quiet.
content.summary: Boomerang with leading edge slightly glowing, the rest transparent/dark

content.detailedDescription:
i am a truck driver who travels between charlotte n.C. and middlesex pa. on the 21st of oct i was traveling north on i-81. the time was about 07:10 p.M. it was dusk with a high overcast. traffic was heavy. at about mile marker 8 in west virginia i noticed a group of lights along a black line off to my right.My first impression was that it was the the top of a building but i did not remember a a building being there.
    it was then i realized it was moving toward the i-81 at a right angle moving in a westerly direction. as our paths of travel converged i looked up as i passed under it what i saw was a large black shallow boomerang or chevron shaped object with six lights grouped in pairs.Two at the sharp apex of the boomerang and two halfway down each wing.From the first time i realized it was a flying object i looked for the faa regulation strobe light but saw none.
    just as the object  crossed the highway it made a quarter turn to the south west just as it disappeared over the cab of my truck.I would have stopped and got out to get a better look but traffic was too heavy to do so safely.
    i would have made this report sooner but but i wanted to make the trip a few more times through the same place to make sure there was nothing there i could have mistaken for something else.I found nothing to explain what i saw.
content.summary: I was traveling north on i-81. saw long black object with six lights moving west.As it passed over me i saw it was a large shallow boomerang.

content.detailedDescription: My fiance went on deck, to be in warm night and view stars. saw object, came in excited and told me. i ran out and saw same in disbelief. we have both seen ufo's before and are open to odd objects and are always looking in sky. we have never seen anything like this. the lights were not blinking and larger than a plane and hovered and moved parallel and then slowly descended and the size of each light within the oval was a tennis ball size. there were two ovals. they slowly descended and faded away. for him they appeared to be a white light on each end of the oval and red in middle and that formed an oval and there were two spaced about apart the size of their individual oval. for me it appeared that each had 3 lights. he took photo with cell camera and it came out one figure odd shaped. and the sky was filled with stars and the camera did not pick up stars. he knew instantly it was odd and not a plane. we were dumbfounded by shape and movement and size.
content.summary: Saw 2 oval sets of lights 3 lights each, evenly spaced apart and hovering

content.detailedDescription: I was letting my dogs out in my backyard and just happen to look up and notice the lights in the sky changing between, white, red and green. it never moved like a helicopter or a blimp or anything that i have seen in our area near our airport here. i first thought it to be a helicopter or blimp but nothing showed any characteristics or either one over time. as, planes in the area came near it, it would change colors or move slightly as if it was trying to avoid them or have them avoid it. i felt that what i was seeing was something normal as in a helicopter or blimp but after seeing it moves in ascending and descending patterns at what i consider very sharp angles i could tell this was neither. the lights just disappeared as thought someone turned the lights off.
content.summary: It looked like an orb or circular object that was hovering about a mile away from my back porch . it was hovering and changed directions slightly and colors.

content.detailedDescription: I was watching tv when i heard a low flying helicopter approaching the home, i ran outside to see it and saw an apparently large helicopter (it was dark) passing over head in a western direction towards lynchburg. approximately 100 yds ahead was a small orange orb, "dot" size. my first thought was "come back!" this was a slow moving event and the helicopter was following the orb. approximately 26 minutes the helicopter came back across the back side of the property, heading in the north east direction. i did not see the orb
content.summary: Small orange orb 100 yds aheadof low flying helicopter

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from work on cr35. i was at an area that is slightly elevated along with having a large clearing to the south (this clearing is about a mile long).  i had my windows down and wasn't necessarily paying attention to anything except the road when i caught a glimpse of something in my peripheral vision to my left out the window. i noticed an object to the south east past the end of the clearing about 5 degrees above my horizon.  it was moving rapidly and what had caught my attention was a slight glowing reflection from the bottom of the object.  i would have thought that it was a training jet (which are common in the area) but i could clearly see the object and it wasn't a jet and it had no lights, identifying markers, and it was very low for any airplane training.
content.summary: Dark, unlite object moving fast, slight reflection from nearby ground lights (community)

content.detailedDescription:
Just got back home took my poodle out to use bathroom noticed him looking up at sky
saw ten teardrop shaped aircraft or spacecraft in v formation one moved out in back tilted slightly and moved up to lead craft then all began to circle started changing color to clear 
then basically teleported 41 years in military know and can fly any aircraft was not geese
since i've hunted since i was ten felt the most calm peaceful feeling before they disappeared
never saw anything like it and i am the most qualified person on earth when observing aircraft or spacecraft and have perfect vision the sky was a perfect blue no clouds and unobstructed view and craft moved slowly and silently whatever they were we're not of this world
content.summary: 10 objects teardrop shaped black and gold in v formation one moved out moved to lead fell back into formation then circled and teleported or became invisible

content.detailedDescription: Driving home, in the dark on a country road, and a light appeared out of no where in the sky. not too high up, definitely much lower than cloud coverage. i first thought it was a falling star but falling stars don't fall straight down and the light just appeared. every fallen star i've seen has shot across the sky. this did not. it fell straight down. it took about 3 seconds from the time the light appeared until the time it fell past the tree line and i could not see. i was waiting to hear an explosion or see some sort of light from a crash. i was thinking by this point some sort of aircraft had fallen. but when i rounded the corner about 10 seconds later i couldn't see anything. no explosion. at this point i tried telling myself this wasn't real and tried to give a good explanation as to what it was. i still have no idea. it was orb like, oval, mainly bright white with a little blueish green at the bottom. it wasn't flashing, it was a constant white but it almost flickered. like when a lightbulb is about to burn out or lose power. if i were to guess, i'd say the light appeared about as high as a skyscraper and fell in a straight line in under 3 seconds. i've been curious all day and have wanted to check out the area in which i saw it fall. but i'm still having a hard time wrapping my mind around what i saw.
content.summary: Fallen orb?

content.detailedDescription: El pasado 30 de marzo del presente año 2015 circulaba con mi coche por una autovía de circunvalación, va30, que rodea la ciudad de valladolid (españa) sobre las 21:25 horas. al pasar junto  a la población de santovenia de pisuerga (pueblo muy cercano a la capital) observé unas "luces" sobre un polígono industrial que en un principio me parecieron luces de un estadio deportivo por su intensidad. a medida que me iba acercando veía con más claridad que no se trataba de ningún foco sino de toberas de cohete que desprendían una llama blanca y azul muy intensa y que pertenecían a un objeto que literalmente estaba flotando sobre el tejado de una nave industrial. boquiabierto y preguntándome constantemente ¿que era eso? lo dejé atrás a mi derecha no acabándome de creer lo que había visto. lo pierdo de vista y no volviendo más la vista atrás para evitar el accidente, continuo en marcha cuando a unos 400 metros aprox. más adelante el objeto volador se sitúa a mi derecha, a unos 100 metros de distancia y es cuando tengo el reflejo de coger mi teléfono móvil para fotografiarlo y cuando le hago las tres fotos que verán a continuación. también grabé con anterioridad a las fotos un video pero por la baja calidad del teléfono y la luz ambiente salió todo en negro, lamentablemente no se veía absolutamente nada. he de añadir que no hacía ningún tipo de ruido, tenía aproximadamente entre 12 y 15 metros de envergadura y podía mantenerse estático en el aire cosa que no he visto nunca en ningún aparato volador conocido que no sea un helicóptero o un avión de guerra tipo "caza", cosa que con toda seguridad no era. por último solo apuntar que si que reduje la velocidad pero no pensé en ningún momento en parar ya que circulaba por una autovía, venía otro vehículo detrás mio a unos 300 o 400 metros y no me hubiese gustado provocar un accidente.
content.summary: Tenia la forma de un croissant alargado
content.locationName: Santovenia de Pisuerga, Castilla y León

content.detailedDescription:
Family and i out during unusuallly warm evening notice a very bright, silent object to the south-southeast of downtown erie. it travels in a straight line fading in brightness as it moves over the lake. no flashing lights, so not conventional aviation, but resembling the iss - lit only by the sun, it had a goldish-white glow. ((i checked - the iss is not around until morning). also not a taurid meteor. hard to say altitude or size, but it was about the size of a bb at arms length and right about 45 degrees above the horizon. when i first saw it it was probably south-southwest of downtown perhaps near summit and tracing a path right up the middle of the city near state street.

about 2 minutes after the first object faded in the north over lake erie another objct with same description followed in it's path. 

i'm a seasoned skywatcher with aviation experice. others in town mentioned sightings last night too.
content.summary: Slow, low, unwavering lighst move south to north

content.detailedDescription: I was driving down college st. going towards sabattus st. , i looked up and saw what looked like a star way up in the sky looking north , there was an airplane looked like a commercial airliner and it was heading toward it and when the airplane got up to it the object disappeared.
content.summary: Thought it was a star but it was 3 in the afternoon nice sunny day

content.detailedDescription:
Approximately october 21, 2015 ufo witness remaining confidential as johnny canuck saw a bright glowing orange disc motionless in the clear sky above land. the witness estimates its size measuring approximately the size of an aspirin at first appearance , say  above trees - located approx. 1.5 miles away from the witness's line of sight. the witness further estimates the object to glowing approx. 500 ft. over land. a few moments later , the witness noticed the object had moved closer to him with a northerly heading. the object now appeared to have descended approx. a few hundred feet over a few islands located in the middle of the said lake. the object measured approx. 150 feet in diameter based on its position over the said islands. the object was bright orange red on its disc like surface and had 3 bright coloured circular like motion lights flashing sequentially underneath the said disc. all 3 lights were spinning individually as a ring like moving object. this object then left slowly in its northerly heading and diminished in size as it ascended into the night sky.

don emilio zinno
mufon quebec field investigator # 23390
content.summary: Ufo witness johnny observed a glowing orange disc approx. 500 ft. in the sky over land.

content.detailedDescription: The night of november 4th 2015 at approx. 8pm i looked up to see what was three illuminated lights traveling horizontally at a slow pace. the lights were so bright on the object that they were brighter than your average full moon. its path left almost like a light trail behind it in the sky. the object quickly sped up and disappeared into thin air. was a very eri experience and also frightening. if i were to have my phone to try to taken a picture the incident happened so fast that it would have been difficult to capture this event.
content.summary: Three glowing orbes of light traveling at a slow pace with a trail behind. speed quickly sped up and disappeared into thin air.

content.detailedDescription: I was on a smoke break across the street from where i work when i noticed a faint moving light.  i first thought that it was a spotlight for a new store, but, as i looked around i then saw that it was overhead, and since the lights were over a cloud cover i could not make out any shape.  (the lights seemed liked a light you make with a flashlight) as i watched them i saw that there were 3 lights which moved from the left to the right in a counterclockwise direction making a sort of half circle.  the light on the left moved fast to the one on the right as they went around.  when i was ready to cross the street i noticed that the lights were still overhead as i was going up the road like they were following me.  the lights then went over the building as i went inside.  i was curious as to what they were and thought it odd since i never saw anything unusual before and never heard of anything in our area.  when i went back to work i told my co-worker that i wish she was with me to see it and to take a picture.
content.summary: 3 unknown lights going in a half circle counterclockwise direction
